title: addtelegrams
author: addtelegrams
content: Hello, I need a 20$ loan.To put it bluntly, it's perfectly normal for someone asking $20 to appear as a scammer. Below are the guarantees I can give for this.- This account can be given as collateral.- https://galxe.com/nft/1085283/0xADc466855ebe8d1402C5F7e6706Fccc3AEdB44a0I only have an account and one NFT as collateral.Thank you.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: How much is the NFT worth? You will probably be able finance a loan with it if it's valuable enough. You have negative trust on your account which drastically devaluates it (nobody wants to own a red-trusted account).

comments.author: addtelegrams
comments.created_time: November 10, 2022, 04:37:54 PMLast edit: November 11, 2022, 01:33:26 AM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on November 10, 2022, 04:28:54 PMHow much is the NFT worth? You will probably be able finance a loan with it if it's valuable enough. You have negative trust on your account which drastically devaluates it (nobody wants to own a red-trusted account).A p2E project listing on kucoin, the token owned by NFT.
